meanings.sent1: I am rereviewing my notes before the test.
meanings.sent2: She is rereviewing the document for any errors.
meanings.sent3: After rereviewing the movie, I noticed a hidden detail.
meanings.sent4: Rereviewing the painting revealed new colors I hadn't seen before.
meanings.sent5: Rereviewing the recipe helped me understand it better.

meanings.definition: The act of reviewing something for a second time.
meanings.sent1: His rereviewing of the report led to important findings.
meanings.sent2: The rereviewing of the contract is necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The rereviewing of the book made me appreciate it even more.
meanings.sent4: Her rereviewing of the map helped us find the right way.
meanings.sent5: The rereviewing of the photos revealed hidden details.
